TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 绑定到数据源中的字段的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that is bound to a field in a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的列类型控件来显示数据源中字段的内容。Use the column type in a control to display the contents of a field in the data source. 单个列中列出了值。The values are listed in a single column. 该字段链接到，因此，数据源中的任何更新将反映的相应单元格中控件。The field is linked to the , so any updates in the data source will reflect in the corresponding cells of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此列类型是的默认值为控件。This column type is the default for the control. 若要控制此列的外观，请使用的样式属性控件。To control appearance of this column, use the style properties of the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本不是 HTML 编码在显示之前。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 这样，可以在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此列的值来自用户输入，请确保验证减少安全漏洞的值。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用中的列类型控件以显示数据源中的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use a column type in the control to display the fields in a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例类，并将其添加到集合。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class and add it to the collection. summary.span: 获取或设置要绑定到 的数据源的字段名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the field name from the data source to bind to the .

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到字段。Use the property to specify the field to bind to the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的数据源中的字段名称。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field in the data source to bind to the . [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BoundColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BoundColumn Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定列中各项的显示格式的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for items in the column.

value.span: 指定列中各项的显示格式的格式化字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format of items in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为列中的项提供自定义格式。Use the property to provide a custom format for the items in the column. 数据格式字符串包含由窗体中的冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式设置字符串{0:F2}显示带两位小数位数的定点数。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值仅可设置为 0，因为每个单元中只有一个值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要显示中的值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数法 （指数） 格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|一般情况下设置显示数值的格式。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数来显示数字。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的列中的各种格式控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify various formats for the columns in the control. `Qty`列的格式设置为一个整数`Price`列的格式设置为货币，`Weight`列设置为十进制数字的格式和`Expires`列设置为短日期和时间字符串格式，如。The `Qty` column is formatted as an integer, the `Price` column is formatted as currency, the `Weight` column is formatted as a decimal number, and the `Expires` column is formatted as a short date and time string. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/cs/BoundColumnSampleCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnDataFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnDataFormatString/vb/BoundColumnSampleVB.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 已转换为由 属性指示的格式的指定值。

span.span: The specified value converted to the format indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将指定的值转换为格式由属性。Use the method to convert the specified value to the format indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回的字符串值的等效如果未设置属性。This method returns the string equivalent of the value if the property is not set.

value.span: 如果不可编辑 中的项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the items in the cannot be edited; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否在项可以进行编辑。Use the property to specify whether the items in the can be edited. 此属性还可以用于以编程方式确定列是否为只读的。This property can also be used to programmatically determine whether the column is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的是只读的。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a is read-only. .Aspx 文件定义三个绑定列控件，并将项目列设置为只读的。The .aspx file defines three BoundColumn controls, and sets the Item column to read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/CS/boundcolumnreadonlycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundColumnReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundColumnReadOnly/VB/boundcolumnreadonlyvb.aspx#1)]
